bacci.giovanni.biogiova.multialignment.scoring

Class LoadedScoreMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacci.giovanni.biogiova.multialignment.scoring.LoadedScoreMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoreMatrix

    public class LoadedScoreMatrix
extends Object
implements ScoreMatrix
    Implementation of ScoreMatrix interface. This class load a matrix from one of the file in "matrices" directory into an HashMap. This class has to be instantiated using the ScoreMatrixFactory.newInstance(bacci.giovanni.biogiova.multialignment.matrices.ScoreMatricesType) factory method.
    Author:
    Giovanni Bacci

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoadedScoreMatrix

        public LoadedScoreMatrix(File matrix,
                 SequencesType type)
                  throws FileNotFoundException
        Public constructor for custom matrix. Each custom matrix has to be in the correct format: 
                   ;Compound1;Compound2;Compound3;Compound4
  Compound1; score1-1; score1-2; score1-3; score1-4
  Compound2; score2-1; score2-2; score2-3; score2-4
  Compound3; score3-1; score3-2; score3-3; score3-4
  Compound4; score4-1; score4-2; score4-3; score4-4
        One can skip the white spaces but has to maintain the correct separation. Each matrix has specify all the character in the SequencesType.getAlphabet() array otherwise an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        matrix - the custom matrix file
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the file doesn't exist
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given matrix don't respect the given SequencesType
